page.title: 16THE VICAR OF WHITKIRK
page.content:
The present vicar of Whitkirk Church is{Rev. Michael Hunter}who succeeded Kranston Garrett in 1978. He is also chaplain to Yorkshire Television and so has a very{busy life}running the church. When he can find the time he likes to watch{Leeds United}play football and the cricket at{Headingly.
The church has{two curates, a verger, {church wardens, sidesmen,}as well as {scouts, guides, cubs and brownies. Together with other groups Mr. Hunter estimates that possibly the best part of a{thousand people}are involved with the church in one way or another.
His busy life means that he does not always see as much of his family as he would like.
